fileMapping.title: File Mapping
fileMapping.description: Map between internal/external container files and directories.  All items are mounted as read-only by default.

internal.description: Path to the file within the container.

external.description: Path to the file on the host, external to the container.

read-only.description: Indicate if the service should only have read-only access to the file.  Defaults to "true".

portMapping.title: Port Mapping
portMapping.description: Expose internal network ports on the container.

internal.description: Port the service exposes within the container.

external.description: Port the container exposes to the wider network.

title: service-manager: Service
description: Defines a single containerized service running on a Docker host.

entrypoint.description: Specify the HTTP/API entrypoint for the service.  This defaults to the service name.

routes.description: The URL path prefixes that will be routed to this service.

listens-on.description: The port that the service is listening on inside of the container.

build-args.title: Build Arguments
build-args.description: Any custom build arguments that will be sent to `docker build`. Cannot be used with 'image'.

additionalProperties.description: A build-type argument sent using the `--build-arg` flag.

environment.title: Environment Variables
environment.description: Provide any environment variables that are needed at runtime.  The keys map directly to the variable names.

files.title: File Mapping
files.description: Specify which external files and directories should be seen by the service.

healthcheck.title: Container Healthcheck
healthcheck.description: Enable/disable the container's healthcheck.  If 'false' it will disable the container's healthcheck, which can be useful if a container has a healthcheck but isn't required.

image.title: Docker/Container Image
image.description: The image to pull from a container repo (usually Docker Hub).  Cannot be used with 'build-args'.

internal.title: Internal Service
internal.description: Declare this service as being an internal service and not reachable outside of the container network.

metadata.title: Container Metadata
metadata.description: Any metadata information associated with the service container.  May be used by service providers (i.e. Docker labels).

service-ports.title: Service Ports
service-ports.description: Any ports, beyond the entrypoint, that the service wishes to expose outside of its container.

volumes.title: Volume Mapping
volumes.description: Specify any volumes that should be attached to the service container.

additionalProperties.description: Maps a volume name to its path in the container.  The volume name is prepended with the service name, e.g. "service-volume".
